def is_interesting(n):
    """
    >>> is_interesting(432)
    True
    >>> is_interesting(99)
    False
    >>> is_interesting(237)
    False
    >>> is_interesting(42)
    True
    """
    return sum(map(int, str(n))) % 4 == 0

def next_interesting(n):
    """
    >>> next_interesting(432)
    435
    >>> next_interesting(99)
    103
    >>> next_interesting(237)
    237
    >>> next_interesting(42)
    44
    """
    while not is_interesting(n):
        n += 1
    return n

    print(next_interesting(int(input())))

def sum_digits(n):
    s = 0
    while n:
        s += n % 10
        n //= 10
    return s

a = int(input())

while sum_digits(a) % 4 != 0:
    a += 1

print(a)
